Name: ThrounnelVR
About the game: ThrounnelVR is a tetris-like puzzler with a first-person view. Controls: - Use your HMD to move the blocks, and your game controller or keyboard to rotate them. - Long press ESC to quit the game. - You can use VIVE controller now!
